features.name: Authentication
features.description: Login system with email and password authentication for Management and Member roles using Supabase Auth

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard showing statistics and overview for both management and member users with charts and summaries

features.name: Barang (Asset) Management
features.description: Complete asset/inventory management system with CRUD operations, loan requests, return handling, and history tracking

features.name: Ruangan (Room) Management
features.description: Room reservation system allowing members to book rooms with time conflict validation and management approval workflow

features.name: Transportasi (Transportation) Management
features.description: Vehicle booking and management system with driver assignment, image upload, and request approval workflow

features.name: User Management
features.description: Admin feature to manage member and management users with search, add, edit, and delete functionality

features.name: Stok Opname
features.description: Inventory audit feature for assets with quantity verification and discrepancy reporting

features.name: Website Content Management
features.description: CMS for managing public website content including hero sections, announcements, and hero videos

features.name: Router & Navigation
features.description: Client-side routing system with hash-based navigation and role-based menu visibility

features.name: API Client
features.description: Centralized API configuration with authentication token handling and base URL management

features.name: Page Loader
features.description: Loading state management with animated loader component for async data fetching
